forecast.day_comments: Partly cloudy, with a low around 23. Calm wind.
forecast.night_comments: Showers likely, mainly after 4pm.  Partly sunny, with a high near 44. South wind 6 to 11 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 70%. New precipitation amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.
